SELECT tpa.*,tft.ID V_FILEID,tac.V_ALI_MONEY,tac.V_WX_MONEY,tsub.USER_NAME, ifnull(tac.V_TOTAL_MONEY,0) V_TOTAL_MONEY,tac.V_PAY_NUM,tft.V_NAME FILE_NAME,tas.V_ORDER_NUM FROM t_pay_account tpa left join t_account_collection tac on tpa.ID = tac.V_ACCOUNT_ID left join t_sys_user_base tsub on tpa.V_CREATE_USER = tsub.USER_ID left join t_file_tab tft on tpa.V_FILE_ID = tft.ID left join t_account_show tas on tpa.ID = tas.V_ACCOUNT_ID
AND tpa.V_CREATE_USER = #{USER_ID}
AND tsub.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{USER_NAME}, '%')
AND tpa.V_PAY_MODEL like CONCAT('%', #{V_PAY_MODEL}, '%')

SELECT tpa.ID, tpa.V_IS_MATCH, tpa.V_PAY_NAME, tas.V_ORDER_NUM, tac.V_PAY_NUM, tac.V_TOTAL_MONEY, tsub.USER_NAME FROM t_user_show tus LEFT JOIN t_bond_today tbt ON tus.V_USER_ID = tbt.V_USER_ID left join t_sys_user_base tsub on tus.V_USER_ID = tsub.USER_ID LEFT JOIN t_account_show tas ON tus.V_USER_ID = tas.V_USER_ID LEFT JOIN t_pay_account tpa ON tas.V_ACCOUNT_ID = tpa.ID LEFT JOIN t_account_collection tac ON tas.V_ACCOUNT_ID = tac.V_ACCOUNT_ID
and tus.V_IS_PAY ='Y' and tas.V_PAY_NUM > 0 and tas.V_ORDER_NUM < 15 and tpa.V_IS_MATCH = 'Y' and tpa.V_IS_LOCK = 'N'
AND tsub.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{USER_NAME}, '%')
order by tus.V_USER_LEVEL,tus.V_PAY_TIME,tas.V_PAY_TIME
